name: Hot Works Permits/Confined Spaces/Working at heights
Correct packings and sufficient at fixings
Reveal material correct size (TWT) and undamaged
Reveal grooves correct size and location for linings
Sealants and air seals installed correctly with Perf rod
Glazing completed correct to specification including wedging
Area and item left clean and tidy
Item inspected, all elements checked, correct, functioning and approved
